page.title: 16WHAT CORRINGHAM NEEDS
page.content: IN{CORRINGHAM}WE NEED A{CINEMA BECAUSE PEOPLE IN CORRINGHAM HAVE TO GO TO BASILDON OR GRAYS TO WATCH NEW FILMS. A{COMPUTER}SHOP WOULD BE HANDY BECAUSE MANY PEOPLE HAVE HOME COMPUTERS AND THE NEED TO BUY SOFTWARE SUCH AS GAMES AND EQUIPMENT AND THE NEAREST COMPUTER SHOP WE HAVE IS IN BASILDON. ALSO A{LAUNDERETTE}WOULD BE VERY CONVENIENT BECAUSE IF SOMEONE HAS A BIG FAMILY,AND THEY GO TO WORK,THEY MAY NOT FIND TIME TO DO THEIR OWN WASHING.SO THEY CAN JUST TAKE IT TO THE LAUNDERETTE. WE SHOULD HAVE A{WET FISH SHOP}IN CORRINGHAM BECAUSE THE FISH IN THE FISH AND CHIP SHOP IS COOKED IN BATTER AND SOME PEOPLE DONT LIKE BATTTER.IF WE COULD HAVE FRESH FISH WE COULD COOK IT HOW WE WANTED TO.
